## Declare a Function

```{julia}
function sayhi(name)
    println("Hi $name, it's great to see you!")
end
```

Single line

```{julia}
square(x) = x^2

square(3)
```

## Broadcast

`broadcast` a function just like using `R`'s `purrr::map()`

```{julia}
A = [i for i in 1:3]

square.(A)
```
